data.title: Seafood Expo North America
data.meta_description: Take a look at the special events at the upcoming edition of Seafood Expo. All events listed are free to all attendees.
data.text:
Step into the realm of professional advancement at the Career Navigator Hub. Immerse yourself in personalized LinkedIn profile advice, career coaching, and idea exchange led by experts. Uncover the untapped potential of AI-driven tools, seamlessly integrated to elevate your profile and personal branding endeavors. Join us as we redefine the future of professional excellence.

Don’t miss out on a complimentary professional headshot!

Seafood Tasting – Surfsnax

Our sustainably farmed Atlantic Salmon jerky is a testament to time honored traditions infused with a modern twist. This irresistibly satisfying snack is high in protein and packed with omega-3 goodness, nourishing body and soul. With just 5 ingredients we have perfected the art of simplicity without compromising flavor.

Seafood Tasting – Pescanova Inc

Grill our Pescanova Vannamei Shrimp Skewers in just 6 minutes or bake them in the oven for 9-10 minutes. Add them to any salad, vegetable, or pasta side for a quick, delicious, flavor-packed meal that everyone around the table is sure to love. Available in 3 flavors and the perfect addition to weekend summer cookouts and easy weeknight dinners!

Seafood Tasting – Custom Culinary

Savor the essence of the sea with Clam Chowder crafted using Custom Culinary Clam Liquid Stock Concentrate, paired with a warm bun brushed with Custom Culinary Buttery Garlic Flavor Glaze. Elevate your experience with the rich taste of clams and the enticing aroma of buttery garlic, a symphony of flavors in every bite. BE TRUE TO THE FOOD™ – Custom Culinary.

Seafood Excellence Awards Announcement & Reception

Dive into the excitement at the Wave Makers’ Zone and be the first to discover the winners of the Seafood Excellence Awards! The Seafood Excellence Awards recognizes and celebrates the best new seafood products in the North American seafood market.

Seafood Tasting – Griffith Foods

Elevate your seafood with Griffith Foods’ Garlic Chili Crunch Seasoning! Crafted from sustainably sourced white pepper, black pepper, garlic, and red pepper, this versatile blend adds bold flavor to any seafood. Join us for a tasting and experience the mouth-watering Garlic Chili Crunch Shrimp – a delicious, sustainable choice. Griffith Foods, where we Blend Care and Creativity to Nourish the World™.

Connecting Women in Seafood – Reception & Networking Event

You’re invited to a networking event for women in the seafood industry. Connect, share experiences and expand your professional network. Let’s join together to create a more inclusive and thriving seafood industry.All are welcome, and no RSVP is required.

Refreshments will be served.

Seafood Tasting – Surfsnax

Our sustainably farmed Atlantic Salmon jerky is a testament to time honored traditions infused with a modern twist. This irresistibly satisfying snack is high in protein and packed with omega-3 goodness, nourishing body and soul. With just 5 ingredients we have perfected the art of simplicity without compromising flavor.

Seafood Tasting – Full Measure Oyster Company

Full Measure Oyster Company utilizes a solar-powered, carbon neutral operation plan to produce the greenest oysters ever. Ultraviolets are nurtured in Nandua Bay, where bayberry and cedar mix with Chesapeake waters to create a fusion of salty and sweet. Tucked amongst saltmarsh meadows behind Virginia’s barrier islands, our seaside farm produces Cedar Island Selects, which pack a clean, salty punch.

Seafood Tasting – Australis Aquaculture LLC

The Better Fish brings you a fresh barramundi experience with exciting flavor profiles, enhancing this Sustainable Sea Bass’™ buttery mild flavor. Our newest innovations, Blackened and Mango Habanero barramundi, were inspired by the latest food trends, giving you a new fun way to enjoy this unique fish packed with Omega 3s, lean protein, and half the calories of salmon!

Oyster Stewardship & Sensory Masterclass

Join Oyster Master Guild co-founders Patrick McMurray and Julie Qiu for an interactive 1-hour Oyster Stewardship & Sensory Masterclass.

You will learn how to taste and describe oysters, shuck and plate oysters like a pro, and gain insider knowledge about the growing business of bivalves.

Seafood Tasting – Ocean Beauty Seafoods

We are pleased to introduce two new products from Echo Falls: honey-cured and applewood-smoked Sockeye Salmon Nuggets and Maple Bourbon Atlantic Salmon. These hot-smoked items are ideal for parties or quick snacks. Additionally, try Ocean Beauty’s new Thai Chili Lime Burger made with wild-caught Alaska salmon and non-GMO vegetable proteins- a guilt-free choice good for you, and for the planet.

Seafood Tasting – Aquamar

Aquamar introduces the first true innovation in refrigerated seafood in decades: Steamed Galician Mussels with Tomato & Garlic, plus Shrimp Skewers with Garlic Dressing—both from Spain—and an incredible Seafood Medley in Seafood Sauce from Italy that goes great over your favorite pasta. Since we did the prep, all three are deliciously easy to enjoy, just heat and serve.

Seafood Tasting – Two Fish Distribution

Experience the authentic taste of seafood boils with Two Fish Frozen Seafood Boil meals. Easy to prepare bags feature premium snow crab legs, succulent shrimp, corn, and potatoes, all paired with the iconic “3 The Chi Way” sauce, a Cajun base sauce. Indulge in restaurant quality seafood boils in the comfort of your home.
